title: unable to export from windows

content:
I am unable to export from tbird windows to Android. When I click on the first qr code and then done phone goes back to the import page. This has been for quite awhile. I have 9 accounts to export and get 3 qr codes on pc.

What do I?

Same on w10 or w11.

title: Blocking spam

content: Is it possible to block or filter spam in Thunderbird. The sender of the spam is not visible. Only subject. I am unable to block these messages.

title: Sign in answer
creator: THANZLIK
content:
Hello,

Can you please help me and advice how Can I put my sign I'm answer above mail which I am answering to? Now when I am answering, my sign is always atthe bottom of page. First is my answer, then message from sender and then my sign (nobody will see it when there will be lot of mails). Thunderbird for PC is doing it as I want it, but I am not able to set it in android version.

Thank you for help.


T.
